title: WA Robot Search Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot search <query>'. Returns FTS search results.

query.description: The FTS5 query that was executed

total_hits.description: Total number of hits (may exceed returned results if limited)

pane_filter.description: If set, results were filtered to this pane_id

since_filter.description: If set, results were filtered to segments after this timestamp (epoch ms)

search_hit.description: A single search result with score and metadata

pane_id.description: Pane the segment was captured from

captured_at.description: Unix timestamp (ms) when the segment was captured

snippet.description: Relevant portion of the segment with match highlights

content.description: Full segment content (present when snippets are disabled)
